C'est soir¬†de derby en Serie A. En effet, la Juventus de Cristiano Ronaldo se d√©place sur la pelouse du Torino pour ce derby de Turin qui s'annonce bouillant. Ce match¬†tourne bien¬†souvent en faveur de la Juventus ces derni√®res ann√©es. En effet, depuis 2001, sur 24 confrontations, le Torino n'en n'a remport√© qu'une ! (victoire 2-1 en avril 2015). Un homme est particuli√®rement friand de cette rencontre : Miralem Pjanic.




Le derby lui r√©ussit !




Pjanic et Ronaldo+12 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

L'international bosnien poss√®de en effet une statistique plus que flatteuse face au Torino. Effectivement, contre eux, il a inscrit quatre¬†buts et d√©livr√© six¬†passes d√©cisives soit plus que sur n'importe quel autre club en Italie. Malheureusement, pour la Juventus, Pjanic est encore incertain pour la rencontre de ce soir et sa pr√©sence pour ce match sera connue √† la derni√®re minute.

text:
Serie A
Juventus: the flattering stat of Pjanic against Torino
Today at 8:45 pm, Juventus are on Torino's pitch for the Turin Derby on the occasion of the 11th Serie A day. A derby that is generally very successful at Miralem Pjanic.
02 Nov 2019, 11:40 by Hugo Deloraine



Juventus: the possible eleven of the seasonAuthor of a successful start to the mercato, the Bianconeri will try to be as competitive on the European scene as on the national scene.



Wojciech SzczƒôsnyAuthor of a successful start to the mercato, the Bianconeri will try to be as competitive on the European scene as on the national scene.



Alex SandroAuthor of a successful start to the mercato, the Bianconeri will try to be as competitive on the European scene as on the national scene.



Giorgio ChielliniAfter a successful start to the mercato, the Bianconeri will try to be as competitive on the European stage as on the national scene.Icon Sport



Matthijs De LigtAuthor of a successful start to the mercato, the Bianconeri will try to be as competitive on the European scene as on the national scene.



Jo√£o CanceloAuthor of a successful start to the mercato, the Bianconeri will try to be as competitive on the European scene as on the national scene.



Miralem PjanicAuthor of a successful start to the mercato, the Bianconeri will try to be as competitive on the European scene as on the national scene.



Blaise MatuidiAuthor of a successful start to the mercato, the Bianconeri will try to be as competitive on the European scene as on the national scene.



Aaron RamseyAuthor of a successful start to the mercato, the Bianconeri will try to be as competitive on the European scene as on the national scene.



Cristiano RonaldoAuthor of a successful start to the mercato, the Bianconeri will try to be as competitive on the European scene as on the national scene.Icon Sport



Mario Mandzukic The author of a successful mercato debut, the Bianconeri will try to be as competitive on the European scene as on the national scene.



Federico BernardeschiAfter a successful start to the mercato, the Bianconeri will try to be as competitive on the European scene as on the national scene.Icon Sport

Juventus: the possible eleven of the season




It's a derby night in Serie A. Indeed, Juventus Cristiano Ronaldo moves on the lawn of Torino for this Turin derby that looks hot. This match often turns in favor of Juventus in recent years. Indeed, since 2001, in 24 confrontations, the Torino has won only one! (2-1 victory in April 2015). A man is particularly fond of this meeting: Miralem Pjanic.




The derby succeeds him!




Pjanic and Ronaldo + 12 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

The Bosnian international has indeed a more than flattering statistic against the Torino. Indeed, against them, he scored four goals and issued six assists more than any other club in Italy. Unfortunately, for Juventus, Pjanic is still uncertain for the match tonight and his presence for this match will be known at the last minute.
